scripts.check:quick: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.check:ci: npm run check:quick && npm run build && npm run check:governance
scripts.check:release: npm run check:ci && npm run check:security
scripts.check:governance: echo 'Governance check: verifying manifest and policies' && node scripts/verify-governance.js
scripts.check:boundaries: echo 'Boundary check: validating import rules' && node scripts/check-boundaries.js
scripts.check:security: echo 'Security check: scanning dependencies and secrets' && npm audit --audit-level=moderate
